description: The shattered remains of the magical ley line intersection. Central hub connecting all regions. Absolutely safe - sanctuary design.

design_philosophy.absolute_safety: No combat, no environmental hazards, no time pressure. Magical wards that hold reality together also repel hostile creatures.
design_philosophy.information_hub: Echo provides guidance, telescope shows region states, journal provides lore. Player can always learn something here.
design_philosophy.progress_tracking: Crystal garden provides visual progress feedback. Each healing in the world lights another crystal.
design_philosophy.moral_mirror: Echo comments on player's actions throughout game - not judging, but remembering. Accountability without moralizing.
design_philosophy.endgame_location: Waystone repair is the culmination. Each fragment placed with narrative weight. Echo transformation as reward.

nexus_chamber.name: Nexus Chamber
nexus_chamber.description: Central hub with damaged waystone. Reality feels thin here.

sensory_hints.north: Cold wind, snow glimpsed through the arch
sensory_hints.up: Stairs spiral toward a platform above

traits: shimmering air where reality is thin
geometric patterns carved into every surface
distant sounds that don't match what you see

observatory_platform.name: Observatory Platform
observatory_platform.description: Elevated platform overlooking the broken landscape.

features.view: All five regions visible - frozen peaks, dense forest, flooded buildings, glowing caves, distant settlement
features.telescope: Can focus on individual regions for status information

keepers_quarters.name: Keeper's Quarters
keepers_quarters.description: Abandoned home of the last Meridian Keeper. Time seems frozen here.

temporal_effects.description: Time is frozen - dust motionless, food preserved, books open
temporal_effects.gameplay_effect: Items stored here never despawn or decay

crystal_garden.name: Crystal Garden
crystal_garden.description: Shattered power crystals that can be gradually restored.

frozen_crystal.restores_when: Telescope repaired OR major healing in region

fungal_crystal.restores_when: Spore Mother healed OR Aldric saved

water_crystal.restores_when: Archivist's quest complete OR major rescue

beast_crystal.restores_when: Wolf trust high OR cubs saved

civilization_crystal.restores_when: Guardian repaired OR hero status achieved

the_echo.name: The Echo
the_echo.description: A spectral remnant of the Keeper's child. Appears intermittently, more frequently as trust grows.

appearance_mechanics.refuses_at_very_low_trust: Trust -3 or below: Echo won't manifest

negative.attack_echo: No effect (incorporeal) but Echo notes it

effects.trust_-3_or_below: Echo refuses to appear. Player loses guidance.
effects.trust_5: Echo speaks player's name with familiarity.
effects.trust_6+: Echo reveals full backstory - was training to be next Keeper.

recovery.from_negative: Actions only, not words. Each healing deed restores +1.
recovery.from_refusing: Major act of healing (save major NPC, restore crystal) allows recovery attempt

backstory.surface_knowledge: The Keeper's child, caught in the disaster
backstory.trust_3_reveals: Was present when it happened, watched parent fail
backstory.trust_6_reveals: Was being trained as next Keeper. Too young when disaster struck. Parent knew convergence was unstable, was trying to fix it.

disaster.summary: Five ley lines converged. Something went wrong. The Keeper tried to contain it. Failed. The blast shattered everything.

regions.summary: Five shattered regions - frozen peaks, fungal depths, drowned district, changed beasts, surviving settlement.

restoration.summary: Echo cannot act, only guide. But waystone can be repaired, crystals restored. Each healing strengthens order.

waystone.summary: Requires fragment from each region: spore heart, ice shard, water pearl, beast fang, town seal.

crystals.summary: Crystal garden once provided buffs. Crystals restore when healing occurs in regions.

commitments.summary: [Dynamic] Echo recites all commitments - active, fulfilled, broken. Approving of kept words, sorrowful about broken ones.

progress.summary: [Dynamic] Echo comments on player's overall progress - regions visited, NPCs helped/harmed, crystals restored.

commitment_awareness.description: Echo senses all commitments through ley line network

responses.on_commitment_fulfilled: Form brightens. 'A word kept. The threads of trust strengthen.'
responses.on_commitment_abandoned: Form dims. 'A word broken. The fractures spread.'

commitment_awareness.assassination_awareness: Echo always knows about assassinations, even if NPCs don't discover. Trust penalty (-2) applies regardless of discovery.

transformation.after: Solid, permanent, able to act. Eyes have color (amber). Can smile genuinely.
transformation.dialog: 'It is done. The meridian is not restored, but the worst is healed. I can exist now. Truly. Because of you.'

damaged_waystone.name: damaged waystone
damaged_waystone.description: A cracked stone pedestal with faded runes. Five empty sockets around its rim.

spore_heart.source: Fungal Depths - Spore Mother gift after healing

beast_fang.source: Beast Wilds - Alpha Wolf gift at high trust

town_seal.source: Civilized Remnants - Council reward at hero status OR guardian repair

repair_ceremony.description: Each fragment placed individually with narrative moment
repair_ceremony.visuals: Each fragment lights its socket with appropriate color
repair_ceremony.completion: All five colors merge, light flares, waystone heals, Echo transforms

when_repaired.player_buff: Meridian Blessing - minor protection in all regions

ancient_telescope.name: ancient telescope
ancient_telescope.description: A brass instrument pointed at the fragmented sky.

use_effect.basic: Overview of all five regions - general description
use_effect.with_frozen_observatory_repaired: Synced detailed information - NPC states, environmental status
use_effect.query_specific_region: Focus on one region for current state

ancient_telescope.synergy: When Frozen Reaches telescope is also repaired, both gain detail from the link

keepers_journal.name: Keeper's journal
keepers_journal.description: A leather-bound journal with meticulous notes.

content.backstory: Details convergence going unstable over days 1247-1255. Keeper's growing concern. Final failed containment attempt.
content.password_fragment: Torn page with: 'Fire-that-gives-life and water-that-cleanses, un-'
content.personal_entries: References to their child (The Echo). Teaching them to be next Keeper. Love and worry intertwined.

temple_password_fragment.name: password fragment
temple_password_fragment.description: A torn page with part of a ritual phrase.
temple_password_fragment.use: Combined with temple inscriptions in Frozen Reaches, allows deduction of full password

cleaning_supplies.name: cleaning supplies
cleaning_supplies.description: Preserved cloths and optical solutions, still usable thanks to frozen time.
cleaning_supplies.use: Required for Frozen Reaches telescope repair

shattered_crystals.name: shattered crystals
shattered_crystals.description: Five major crystals forming a circle, most dark and cracked.

restoration_mechanism.trigger: Major healing or restoration in corresponding region
restoration_mechanism.visual: Crystal lights up with appropriate color when restored
restoration_mechanism.buff_application: Touch restored crystal to receive permanent buff

animator_crystal.name: animator crystal
animator_crystal.description: A faintly glowing crystal that pulses with captured life force.
animator_crystal.use: Required to repair Damaged Guardian in Civilized Remnants

absolute_safety.description: Nexus is completely safe - magical wards repel all threats
absolute_safety.hostile_creatures_repelled: Wards push back anything hostile - player cannot bring enemies here

temporal_stasis.description: Time is frozen in Keeper's Quarters
temporal_stasis.effect: Items stored here never despawn or decay
temporal_stasis.narrative: Dust motionless, food preserved, books open to same pages

reality_instability.description: Reality is thin in the Nexus - glimpses of other regions flicker through
reality_instability.effect: Narrative flavor only, no mechanical impact
reality_instability.frequency: Increases as player progresses, decreases after waystone repair

to_sunken_district.companion_rules: All companions comfortable (water doesn't flood into Nexus)

to_frozen_reaches.companion_rules: All companions comfortable (cold doesn't penetrate Nexus)

nexus_as_hub.description: The Nexus is the CENTRAL HUB for commitment tracking through The Echo
nexus_as_hub.echo_awareness: Senses all commitments through ley line network
nexus_as_hub.commitment_summary: Player can ask Echo about 'promises' for full status report

waystone_commitment.goal: Gather all five fragments and repair waystone
waystone_commitment.note: The grand commitment - THE game goal

fulfillment.reward: Game completion state. Echo becomes permanent. All crystal buffs active. Fast travel enabled.

withdrawal_response.dialog: 'The path is long. Rest. But do not forget - the meridian waits.'

abandonment.note: Cannot truly abandon - player can always return
abandonment.long_delay_effect: Echo dialog becomes pleading, sad. Environmental spreads worsen.
abandonment.no_repair_ending: Echo remains trapped forever. Sad ending state.

crystal_restoration.tracking: Each crystal has boolean restored state
crystal_restoration.visual_progress: Restored crystals glow with region-appropriate color

echo_trust.affects: Echo appearance rate, dialog depth, backstory revelation

waystone_state.fragments_tracked: Each of 5 fragments has boolean placed state
waystone_state.completion_effect: Fast travel, Echo transformation, Meridian Blessing

item_storage.effect: Items stored here are permanent and safe

purpose: Safe haven for rest and recovery
Information hub through Echo and telescope
Moral mirror through Echo's commitment awareness

emotional_arc.mid_game: Increasingly welcoming. Echo relationship develops. Crystals light up.
emotional_arc.late_game: Home base. Echo is friend. Progress visible.

dark_endings.description: What happens when players take dark paths or fail significantly

echo_trust_thresholds.below_-3: Echo refuses to appear. Worst ending tier.

triumphant.description: Echo transforms fully. Becomes permanent companion if player wishes. World healing accelerates.
triumphant.echo_dialog: 'You did more than repair the meridian. You healed it. Healed me. I remember what hope feels like now. Thank you... friend.'

successful.description: Echo transforms. Grateful but relationship is functional, not deep.
successful.echo_dialog: 'It is done. The waystone lives again. I can exist now. You have my gratitude.'

bittersweet.description: Echo transforms but is distant. Player saved the world but not their relationships.
bittersweet.echo_dialog: 'The meridian is restored. The world will heal. But I wonder... at what cost? Go. You've earned your reward. I'll remember what you did. All of it.'

hollow_victory.description: Echo transforms but refuses to speak further. Player completed goal but burned too many bridges.
hollow_victory.echo_dialog: 'It functions. The waystone works. I am corporeal now.' Silence. 'There is nothing more to say between us. The meridian remembers everything. As do I.'
hollow_victory.permanent_effect: Echo never speaks to player again. Fast travel works but Nexus feels empty.

pyrrhic.description: Waystone can still be repaired but Echo refuses to participate in ceremony.
pyrrhic.mechanics: Player places fragments alone. No transformation scene. Echo absent.
pyrrhic.echo_note: Echo watches from shadows but will not manifest for someone who broke too many promises.
pyrrhic.outcome: Fast travel works. World technically saved. But player saved nothing that mattered.
pyrrhic.final_message: The waystone glows. The fractures seal. Somewhere, you sense the Echo watching. But it does not come. It will never come again.

abandoned.description: Player stops playing or explicitly gives up
abandoned.outcome: Environmental spreads continue. NPCs die over time. Echo grows fainter.
abandoned.if_player_returns_much_later: Echo barely visible. 'You came back. After so long. The world... it's almost gone. Is there still time? Is there still hope?'

assassination_special_handling.description: Murder is the darkest choice and permanently marks the player
assassination_special_handling.echo_awareness: Always knows, regardless of NPC discovery
additional_effects: Echo dialog references 'blood on your hands' even at high trust
Transformation scene has shadow elements: 'I become real. But I carry your shadow with me now.'

multiple_assassinations.threshold: 3+ assassinations: Echo refuses to manifest permanently, pyrrhic ending is best possible

from_negative_trust.method: Major healing deeds restore +1 trust each

from_assassination.method: Cannot undo knowledge of murder, but trust CAN recover
from_assassination.consequence: Triumphant ending forever locked, but successful ending achievable
from_assassination.echo_dialog_at_recovered_trust: 'I know what you did. I cannot forget. But I see what you've done since. Perhaps... perhaps that matters too.'

from_exile.method: Exile status doesn't affect Echo trust directly
from_exile.but: Actions that caused exile likely damaged trust already

effects.at_boundary: Magical wards repel wolves. They cannot physically enter.
effects.description: Wolves pace at boundary, whining. Something pushes them back.

waiting_behavior.location: Just outside Nexus boundary (any exit direction)

effects.general: Salamander finds Nexus pleasantly warm. Magical energy seems to invigorate it.
effects.near_crystals: Salamander drawn to crystal garden. Its flame brightens near restored crystals.

salamander.echo_reaction: Echo curious about fire elemental. 'A child of flame. We had many here, before. They helped maintain the ley lines.'

human_companion.all_humans: Nexus is safe haven for all human companions. No restrictions.

sira_specific.dialog: 'This place... it's strange. But peaceful. I could stay here a while.'
sira_specific.if_echo_appears: Sira startled by Echo. 'Is that... a ghost?'

aldric_specific.dialog: 'The Nexus! I read about this place. The heart of the meridian...'
aldric_specific.scholarly_interest: Aldric may spend extended time studying if player permits. Provides lore unlocks.

waiting_behavior.description: Wolves wait outside boundary. All others can enter freely.
waiting_behavior.return_behavior: Wolves rejoin at boundary when player exits

resolved_questions.question: Should the Nexus have any combat encounters?
resolved_questions.resolution: No - guaranteed safe zone. Magical wards repel all hostile creatures.

resolved_questions.question: Can The Echo appear outside the Nexus?
resolved_questions.resolution: Rarely, at critical moments (player about to make irreversible choice, major NPC dying). Brief, cryptic guidance only.

resolved_questions.question: What if player loses all Echo trust?
resolved_questions.resolution: At trust -3 or below, Echo refuses to appear. Player loses guidance but can still complete game. Some endings locked (Echo-dependent). Recovery possible through major healing deeds.

resolved_questions.question: What happens if player never repairs waystone?
resolved_questions.resolution: Echo remains spectral, trapped forever. Environmental spreads continue unchecked. Sad ending state but game still 'completable' in sense of exploring all content.

resolved_questions.question: Can player store items safely in Nexus?
resolved_questions.resolution: Yes - temporal stasis in Keeper's Quarters preserves everything. Nothing despawns or decays.

resolved_questions.question: Does Echo know about assassination contracts?
resolved_questions.resolution: Yes - always knows through ley line network, even if NPCs don't discover. Trust penalty (-2) applies regardless of discovery.

resolved_questions.question: What is the minimum Echo trust for waystone completion?
resolved_questions.resolution: No minimum - waystone can be repaired at any trust level. But ending quality depends on trust. At -3 or below, Echo won't participate (pyrrhic ending). See dark_endings section.

resolved_questions.question: Can dark-path players complete the game?
resolved_questions.resolution: Yes - all paths lead to potential completion. But ending quality varies dramatically. Assassins get hollow victory at best. Very dark players get pyrrhic ending. Game never locks player out of mechanical completion.
